languages.text: "Все грешны. Скверна, в которой мы тонем, столь непроглядна, что я не вижу разницы между чистейшими и нечестивейшими".
"None are unsullied. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."
languages.original_text: "Все грешны. Скверна, в которой мы тонем, столь непроглядна, что я не вижу разницы между чистейшими и нечестивейшими".

traits.locale_text: "None are without sin. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."
"None are without sin. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."
"None are without sin. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."
"None are without sin. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."
"None are unsullied. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."

languages.text: “世上没有人是无罪的。吞没我们的腐化不可逾越，因此我看不出最纯洁的人与最卑鄙的人之间有什么区别。”
languages.original_text: "None are unsullied. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."

traits.locale_text: “这世上没有人是无罪的。吞没我们的腐化不可逾越，因此我看不出最纯洁的人与最卑鄙的人之间有什么区别。”

languages.text: «No hay nadie sin mancha. La corrupción que nos atormenta es tan impregnable que no veo diferencia alguna entre lo más puro y lo más vil».
languages.original_text: "None are unsullied. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."

traits.locale_text: «Nadie se libra del pecado. La corrupción que nos atormenta es tan impregnable que no veo diferencia alguna entre lo más puro y lo más vil».

languages.text: 「汚れのない者などいません。我々を溺れさせる堕落とはあまりに不可解なため、純粋であろうがもっとも下劣な者であろうが、そこに変わりはないと思います」
languages.original_text: "None are unsullied. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."

traits.locale_text: 「汚れのない者などいません。我々を溺れさせる堕落とはあまりに不可解なため、純粋であろうがもっとも下劣な者であろうが、そこに変わりはないと思います」

languages.text: "Niemand ist unbefleckt. Die Korruption, die uns ertränkt, ist so undurchdringlich, dass ich zwischen den Reinsten und den Verderbtesten keinen Unterschied erkenne."
languages.original_text: "None are unsullied. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."

traits.locale_text: "Niemand ist ohne Sünde. Die Korruption, die uns ertränkt, ist so undurchdringlich, dass ich zwischen den Reinsten und den Verderbtesten keinen Unterschied erkenne."

languages.text: « Personne n'est parfait. La corruption qui nous noie est si impénétrable que je ne saurais voir la différence entre les plus purs et les plus infâmes. »
languages.original_text: "None are unsullied. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."

traits.locale_text: « Nous péchons tous un jour. La corruption qui nous noie est si impénétrable que je ne ne saurais voir la différence entre les plus purs et les plus infâmes. »

languages.text: "Kimse tamamen arı değildir. Bizi kendine çeken yozlaşma o kadar aşılmaz ki en saf olan ile en kötücül olan arasında hiçbir fark göremiyorum."
languages.original_text: "None are unsullied. The corruption that drowns us is so impenetrable that I see no difference between the purest and the vilest."

traits.locale_text: "Kimse tamamen arı değildir. Bizi kendine çeken yozlaşma o kadar aşılmaz ki en saf olan ile en kötücül olan arasında hiçbir fark göremiyorum."
